thread.title: Facebook announces new online dating service

title: Facebook announces new online dating service
text:
Facebook announces new online dating service Tuesday, May 01, 2018 - 01:51
Even as he continues to face backlash from a massive data scandal, Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg announced plans for a new dating service on the world's largest social media network. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Even as he continues to face backlash from a massive data scandal, Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg announced plans for a new dating service on the world's largest social media network. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2KvXqOS
